caller_intent: The caller wants to add a trailer to their insurance policy and needs clarification on coverage details, specifically regarding liability, comprehensive, and collision coverage for the trailer.
resolution_steps: Agent confirmed the need for the trailer's make and serial number (found on the recently received title).
Explained that liability coverage follows the towing vehicle, not the trailer.
Discussed adding comprehensive and collision coverage for the trailer.
Caller provided the trailer's VIN (7P...5611000561) and model year (2026).
summary: Caller seeks to add a trailer to their insurance, requiring serial number verification and coverage clarification. Agent explained liability rules and confirmed trailer details (2026 model, VIN provided). Outcome requires follow-up to finalize policy changes.
